Additional permission for code generator templates (*.ftl files)
As a special exception, you may create a larger work that contains part or all of the MCreator code generator templates (*.ftl files) and distribute that work under terms of your choice, so long as that work isn't itself a template for code generation. Alternatively, if you modify or redistribute the template itself, you may (at your option) remove this special exception, which will cause the template and the resulting code generator output files to be licensed under the GNU General Public License without this special exception.
